alert.note: Alert for Burnet; Llano (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 16 at 10:57PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Llano and central Burnet Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1057 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Buchanan Lake Village, or near Buchanan Dam, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Burnet, Kingsland, Bertram, Buchanan Dam, Buchanan Lake Village, Inks Lake State Park, Watson, Oatmeal, Lake Victor, Sunnylane, Longhorn Cavern State Park, Joppa and Shady Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
